trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class that represents a tracking channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""> </xref>基底類別，表示追蹤通道。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] If a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService> is present, the runtime tracking infrastructure calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> to get a tracking channel for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]如果<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>已存在，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A>取得工作流程執行個體的追蹤通道。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService>

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure uses this tracking channel to send tracking records associated with the workflow instance back to the host application whenever the tracking infrastructure matches a track point in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構使用此追蹤通道來傳送追蹤記錄工作流程執行個體相關聯回主應用程式時，追蹤基礎結構符合追蹤點在<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>工作流程執行個體相關聯。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: Your application can treat this tracking information in any way you choose.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式可以以任何您選擇的方式處理這些追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> writes tracking information to a SQL database.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>追蹤資訊寫入 SQL 資料庫。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>

trans-unit.source: To create a tracking channel for your tracking service, derive a class from the TrackingChannel base class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立您的追蹤服務的追蹤通道，請從 TrackingChannel 基底類別衍生類別。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters> object passed by the runtime tracking infrastructure in its call to your implementation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> to associate each instance of your tracking channel with a specific workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters>由執行階段追蹤基礎結構的實作的呼叫中傳遞物件<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A>每個執行個體的追蹤通道關聯的特定工作流程執行個體。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingService.GetTrackingChannel%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingParameters>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine requests a tracking channel from each tracking service that has provided a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行階段引擎會從提供的每個追蹤服務要求追蹤通道<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>工作流程執行個體。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, notifies a receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with the tracking channel has either completed or terminated.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，通知追蹤通道上的資料與追蹤通道關聯之工作流程執行個體已完成或終止的接收者。

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure calls InstanceCompletedOrTerminated to notify the receiver of data on the tracking channel that the workflow instance associated with this tracking channel has either terminated or completed.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫以通知追蹤通道與此追蹤通道關聯之工作流程執行個體終止或完成上的資料接收者 InstanceCompletedOrTerminated。

trans-unit.source: No more data will be sent on the tracking channel.
trans-unit.target: 沒有更多的資料將會追蹤通道上傳送。

trans-unit.source: When InstanceCompletedOrTerminated is called, you may perform whatever actions are required by your implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> class.
trans-unit.target: InstanceCompletedOrTerminated 呼叫時，您可能會執行任何動作所需的<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>類別</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>的實作

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, sends a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref> on the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，會傳送<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord"></xref>上<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure calls Send to deliver a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord> on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> when it matches a track point in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫傳遞<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord>上<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>中的追蹤點符合時</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingRecord>傳送

trans-unit.source: You can treat the tracking information sent on the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel> in whatever manner the requirements of your application dictate.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將上傳送的追蹤資訊<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>方式應用程式的要求。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingChannel>
